code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import routineService from'../services/routineTemplateService';import'./styles/routineTemplates.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TherapistTemplates(){const[templates,setTemplates]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{routineService.getTemplates().then(res=>setTemplates(res.data)).catch(console.error);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tpl-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"tpl-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Plantillas de Rutinas"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/therapist/templates/new'),className:"btn-new",children:"+ Nueva Plantilla"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tpl-grid",children:templates.map(t=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tpl-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:t.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"tpl-desc",children:t.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"tpl-meta",children:[t.type," \xB7 ",t.duration," min"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate(`/therapist/templates/${t._id}/assign`),className:"btn-assign",children:"Asignar"})]},t._id))})]});}
